preqs: ECC2000 or admission to course 3842 or with approval from the Course Director.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3842} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECF5421, ECX5420} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true

unitName: Special research topics in applied economics
description: This unit will draw on different fields of applied economics such as applied general equilibrium economics, monetary economics, international economics, labour economics, public finance, and international trade and finance. The studies in these areas will be drawn together by research workshops where students present research papers in their chosen topic.
